version_description:
RetailBox 5.2 includes improvements, bug fixes and support for sharing and recommending screen savers.

Haptic Touch

• Press on screen savers to share with friends and family using Messages or supported third-party apps like Telegram
• Recommend screen savers to help improve future releases based on user feedback with a tap

Download Indicators

• Access download indicators to quickly determine if screen savers have been downloaded
• Easily disable in Settings > Data Usage
• Displays "4K HDR" labels for supported screen savers

This update also includes bug fixes and other improvements. This update:

• Adds the ability for users to copy and paste the User ID from Settings > About
• Return to the top by tapping the tab bar
• Fixes an issue that prevented Quick Status from properly recognizing iPhone 11 and iPhone 11 Pro
• Addresses an issue that caused an inconsistent font width in Settings
RetailBox 5.2.4 fixes an issue that caused RetailBox to quit unexpectedly or become unavailable after using Search.

RetailBox 5.3 adds support for disliking screen savers and introduces in-app notifications. This update also provides additional stability and performance improvements.

• Tap and hold on content to Dislike screen savers and help improve future releases
• In-app notifications display important announcements, new releases, and promotional news when you next open RetailBox
• Adds an option in Settings to join the RetailBox Preview to test pre-release versions and provide feedback
• Improves the experience when sharing screen savers with third-party apps

Other improvements and fixes include:

• Adds support for iPhone SE (2nd generation)
• Adds support for iPad Pro 11-inch (2nd generation) and iPad Pro 12.9-inch (4th generation)
• Updated and additional control over push notification subscriptions
• Fixes an issue that caused RetailBox to crash when sharing content on iPad
• Addresses an issue where push notifications could fail to be delivered
• Resolves an issue where playback might resume to a black screen after screen recording
• Resolves an issue that could cause RetailBox to unexpectedly quit after playing multiple screen savers
• Fixes an issue that caused Quick Status device icons to have an unexpected appearance in Dark Mode on iPhone 8 and earlier
RetailBox 5.3.5 includes improvements and bug fixes, including a fix for an issue that impacted the appearance of Settings in Light mode.

RetailBox 5.4 introduces a new Pride Home Screen Icon, inspired by the rainbow flag, and includes enhancements for iPad. This release also provides additional bug fixes and performance improvements.

• New Pride (2020) Home Screen Icon, inspired by the rainbow flag
• A new layout in Featured for iPad puts even more screen savers on each row
• Introduces audio support during screen saver playback for some third-party apps
• Includes additional information in Settings about app release type and device information

Other improvements and fixes

• Fixes an issue that prevented content suggestions from being accurately recorded
• Addresses issues on iPhone SE (1st generation) which could cause some content to become clipped or misaligned
• Addresses an issue on iPad Pro 12.9-inch (4th generation) and iPad Pro 11-inch (2nd generation) that could prevent device icons from changing between Light and Dark modes in Quick Status
RetailBox 5.4.2 includes important bug fixes and improvements and is recommended for all users.

RetailBox 5.5 introduces in-app notifications and improvements to Library Lock. This update also contains bug fixes and stability improvements.

• In-app notifications display important announcements, new releases and promotional news when you next open RetailBox
• Adds a setting to confirm new Library Lock passwords

Other improvements and fixes include

• Fixes an issue that could cause screen savers to not play on launch even when the Autoplay setting is enabled
• Resolves an issue where push notifications could fail to be delivered
• Addresses an issue that caused the Privacy Policy link in Settings to load to an incorrect page

RetailBox 5.5.1 includes new features, improvements and bug fixes and is recommended for all users. This update:

• Introduces the ability to open RetailBox from supported apps with universal links
• Adds additional and updated preferences over notification subscription topics in Settings

This update also includes bug fixes and improvements:

• Support for iOS & iPadOS 13.5 and later
• Addresses launch performance and stability issues
• Fixes an issue that caused the Share sheet on iPad to appear in an incorrect location
• Resolves an issue that temporarily prevented new screen savers from downloading on the 1st day of each month
• Fixes an issue on iPad that caused certain interface elements in Settings to appear in an unexpected size
RetailBox 5.6.2 includes bug fixes and improvements.
